section.title: IS_DMA_ALL_INSTANCE

section.title: IS_TIM_CCX_INSTANCE
section.programlisting: ((((INSTANCE) == TIM1) && \ (((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_1) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_2) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_3) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_4))) \ || \ (((INSTANCE) == TIM2) && \ (((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_1) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_2) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_3) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_4))) \ || \ (((INSTANCE) == TIM3) && \ (((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_1) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_2) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_3) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_4))) \ || \ (((INSTANCE) == TIM4) && \ (((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_1) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_2) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_3) || \ ((CHANNEL) == TIM_CHANNEL_4))))
